items.name: Speculative Evolution Wiki
items.title: Speculative Evolution Wiki
items.headline: Welcome Speculative Evolution Wiki
items.desc:
Welcome to SpecWiki! The online encyclopedia about speculative evolution that anyone can edit!

Speculative biology, or speculative evolution, is a term that refers to a very hypothetical field of science that makes predictions and hypotheses on the evolution of life in a wide variety of scenarios and is also a form of fiction to an extent. It uses scientific principles and laws and applies them to a "what if" question (for instance: "What if Homo sapiens never evolved?"). Several fields exist, including alternative timeline, future evolution, and exobiology.
